readable.title: 1093737381_b313cd49ff
readable.content: A woman in a blue dress stands with a chalk portrait of two children playing by a stream . A woman standing in front of a chalk drawing A woman stands next to a chalk drawing in front of a barn-like structure . A woman stands outside near an elaborate chalk illustration . A woman wearing a blue dress is drawing a picture of a boy and a girl on the sidewalk with sidewalk chalk .
